’ .
/lozenge6 Remember that each of the small boxes in the vertical column of the partograph 
represents a half-hour interval.
/circle6 Note the condition of the membranes and observe the colour of the amniotic fl  uid as 
visible at the vulva every half an hour. 
/lozenge6 Record in the partograph as follows:
 /circle6 Membranes intact (mark ‘I’)
 /circle6 Membranes ruptured:
- Clear liquor (mark ‘C’)
- Meconium-stained liquor (mark ‘M’)
Labour
